data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Verona.
In the minute 2, Sampdoria have a goal kick.
Can Sampdoria capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hellas Verona's half?
Important block from the Hellas Verona defence as Jakub Jankto fires in a strike for Sampdoria.
In the minute 6, Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sampdoria's half?
Riccardo Ros signals a Hellas Verona throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Hellas Verona.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Riccardo Ros.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
In the minute 19, Valerio Verre (Sampdoria) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Sampdoria in the half of Hellas Verona.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 26, Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Lorenzo Tonelli is booked for the away team.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Riccardo Ros.
In the minute 30, Riccardo Ros signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Throw-in Hellas Verona.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Riccardo Ros awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Riccardo Ros awards the away team a throw-in.
Riccardo Ros signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hellas Verona make their first substitution with Matteo Lovato replacing Federico Ceccherini.
In the minute 40, Riccardo Ros signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
Sampdoria take a 0-1 lead thanks to Albin Ekdal.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Riccardo Ros.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Hellas Verona.
Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 45, Riccardo Ros signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Riccardo Ros blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Riccardo Ros awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Sampdoria.
Riccardo Ros signals a throw-in for Hellas Verona, close to Sampdoria's area.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
In the minute 54, Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Riccardo Ros.
Valerio Verre puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Riccardo Ros signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 56, Riccardo Ros awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
At Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi, Davide Faraoni has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Darko Lazovic with Kevin Ruegg.
The home team have replaced Miguel Veloso with Adrien Tameze. This is the third substitution made today by Ivan Juric.
Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
In the minute 62, Ebrima Colley is on a sub for Samuel Di Carmine for Hellas Verona.
Hellas Verona are whistled for offside.
In the minute 64, Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.

Free kick Hellas Verona.
Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hellas Verona have been given a penalty at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi...
Mikkel Damsgaard (Sampdoria) has received a yellow card from Riccardo Ros.
In the minute 70, Gaston Ramirez is replacing Valerio Verre for the away team.
Mattia Zaccagni's penalty pulls one back for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Throw-in for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.

Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Mehdi Leris is on a sub for Jakub Jankto for Sampdoria.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 77, Eddie Salcedo for Hellas Verona has been booked by Riccardo Ros and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Sampdoria.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Sampdoria in the half of Hellas Verona.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Riccardo Ros awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.

Throw-in high up the field for Sampdoria in Verona.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 83, Riccardo Ros signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
In Verona, Sampdoria push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 85, Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
Hellas Verona make their fifth substitution with Koray Gunter replacing Pawel Dawidowicz.

Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Riccardo Ros.
Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
The match has come to a close in Verona. The final score is 1-2.
Sampdoria's Adrien Silva has been booked in Verona.
